title: Wheres the changing name feature?
body:
i cant find it?..
Edit: nvm i found it

replies.body: Yeah, the account section of the store is currently a little silhouette of a person on the top right.  Zombiemaster was able to lead the way here!  I'm glad you were able to find it!
To change your summoner name, go to the store and click on the "Account" button in the top right corner, and it should there.

> [{quoted}](name=Zombiemaster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HzYgkni2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-23T08:27:59.734+0000)
>
> To change your summoner name, go to the store and click on the "Account" button in the top right corner, and it should there.

ik i forgot to edit it sorry.
